title: Cheon Il Guk Anthem

tokens.lyric: The budding rose of love will bloom, with new tidings of hope.

lines.raw: [A]The budding rose of love will bloom, with new tidings of hope.

tokens.lyric: May the world live in new freedom, Earth and Heaven rebound

lines.raw: [F#m]May the world live in new freedom, Earth and Heaven rebound

tokens.lyric: As the Reign of Peace brings hope, prosperity and love

lines.raw: [D]As the Reign of Peace brings hope, prosperity and love

tokens.lyric: Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

lines.raw: [E7]Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

tokens.lyric: The lily beams in Heaven's light, vibrant colors abound

lines.raw: [A]The lily beams in Heaven's light, vibrant colors abound

tokens.lyric: In the Goodness of the Spirit, Pure new love lights our way

lines.raw: [F#m]In the Goodness of the Spirit, Pure new love lights our way

tokens.lyric: Ever prosper in God's Love, rejoice for evermore

lines.raw: [D]Ever prosper in God's Love, rejoice for evermore

tokens.lyric: Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

lines.raw: [E7]Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

tokens.lyric: The dignity of pure new life, manifests the Ideal

lines.raw: [A]The dignity of pure new life, manifests the Ideal

tokens.lyric: As the crane flies over mountains, God's command is revealed

lines.raw: [F#m]As the crane flies over mountains, God's command is revealed

tokens.lyric: May the World of Heaven and Earth, rejoice in morning's calm

lines.raw: [D]May the World of Heaven and Earth, rejoice in morning's calm

tokens.lyric: Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

lines.raw: [E7]Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

tokens.lyric: True Parents bring True Love to all, Earth and Heaven resound

lines.raw: [A]True Parents bring True Love to all, Earth and Heaven resound

tokens.lyric: For the hope of all the Ages, is the Kingdom of God

lines.raw: [F#m]For the hope of all the Ages, is the Kingdom of God

tokens.lyric: As the flag of Cheon Il Guk waves firmly for all time

lines.raw: [D]As the flag of Cheon Il Guk waves firmly for all time

tokens.lyric: Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

lines.raw: [E7]Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

source:
{title: Cheon Il Guk Anthem}
{key: A}

{section: Verse 1}
[A]The budding rose of love will bloom, with new tidings of hope.
[F#m]May the world live in new freedom, Earth and Heaven rebound
[D]As the Reign of Peace brings hope, prosperity and love
[E7]Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

{{section: Verse 2}
[A]The lily beams in Heaven's light, vibrant colors abound
[F#m]In the Goodness of the Spirit, Pure new love lights our way
[D]Ever prosper in God's Love, rejoice for evermore
[E7]Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

{{section: Verse 3}
[A]The dignity of pure new life, manifests the Ideal
[F#m]As the crane flies over mountains, God's command is revealed
[D]May the World of Heaven and Earth, rejoice in morning's calm
[E7]Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God

{{section: Verse 4}
[A]True Parents bring True Love to all, Earth and Heaven resound
[F#m]For the hope of all the Ages, is the Kingdom of God
[D]As the flag of Cheon Il Guk waves firmly for all time
[E7]Shining for Eternity, in the Cheon Il Guk, in the Land of God
